headline: Agoda maps out Asia's recommended cities to experience spring flower blooms
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda highlights a selection of cities across Asia where travelers can experience seasonal flower blooms from March through May. Across different markets, spring brings distinct floral moments that shape local festivals, outdoor spaces, and travel experiences. For travelers planning trips around nature-focused activities, these bloom periods offer a timely reason to explore urban landscapes through a seasonal lens.
